descriptor.name: Vivitra 440mg Health and Wellness (brand - Cipla) by Health & Wellness Store
descriptor.short_desc: Generic Name: Trastuzumab Dosage: Vivitra 150mg Injection / Vivitra 440mg Injection Storage: Store in a temperature (2 - 8°C). Do not freeze. Trastuzumab is a monoclonal antibody drug used to treat breast cancer. It is specifically effective against HER2-positive breast cancer, a subtype known for its aggressive nature. Trastuzumab works by targeting HER2 receptors on cancer cells, inhibiting their growth and spread. Trastuzumab has significantly improved survival rates and outcomes for individuals with HER2-positive breast cancer. Patients receiving Trastuzumab require careful monitoring for potential side effects, which can include heart problems.

descriptor.name: Maball 500mg Health and Wellness (brand - Cipla) by Health & Wellness Store
descriptor.short_desc: Generic Name: Rituximab Dosage: Maball 100mg Injection / Maball 500mg Injection Storage: Store in a temperature (2 - 8°C). Do not freeze. Rituximab is an immunosuppressive drug used to treat various autoimmune diseases and certain types of cancer. It is a monoclonal antibody that targets specific cells in the immune system, known as B cells. Rituximab is used to treat autoimmune conditions like rheumatoid arthritis, lupus, and certain vasculitides by reducing B cell activity. It\'s also utilized in cancer therapy, especially for non-Hodgkin lymphoma and chronic lymphocytic leukemia. Regular monitoring is essential during Rituximab therapy to manage potential side effects and ensure its effectiveness.

descriptor.name: Veenat 400mg Health and Wellness (brand - Cipla) by Health & Wellness Store
descriptor.short_desc: Generic Name: Rituximab Dosage: Veenat 100mg Tablets / Veenat 400mg Tablets Imatinib Tablets are a vital medication used in cancer treatment. Veenat tablets are prescribed by oncologists to combat chronic myeloid leukemia (CML) and gastrointestinal stromal tumors (GISTs). They work as targeted therapy, effectively inhibiting abnormal cell growth. Administered orally, Imatinib Tablets can have potential side effects, so it\'s essential to consult a healthcare provider for guidance when using them.

descriptor.name: Cizumab 400mg Health and Wellness (brand - Cipla) by Health & Wellness Store
descriptor.short_desc: Generic Name: Bevacizumab Dosage: Cizumab 100mg Injection / Cizumab 400mg Injection Storage: Store in a temperature (2 - 8°C). Do not freeze. Bevacizumab Infusion is a medication commonly used in cancer treatment. It works by inhibiting the growth of blood vessels within tumors, effectively limiting their blood supply. This infusion therapy is employed in the treatment of various cancer types and is typically administered intravenously. Bevacizumab is often used in combination with other cancer therapies. It is essential to consult with a healthcare provider or oncologist for guidance on its use and to understand potential side effects.

descriptor.name: Lenangio 10mg Health and Wellness (brand - Cipla) by Health & Wellness Store
descriptor.short_desc: Generic Name: Lenalidomide Dosage: Lenangio 5mg Capsule / Lenangio 10mg Capsule / Lenangio 25mg Capsule Lenangio capsule used in the treatment of certain blood disorders and cancers. These capsules contain lenalidomide, an immunomodulatory drug that helps regulate the immune system and inhibit abnormal cell growth. Lenangio Capsule are prescribed by healthcare professionals, often as part of a treatment regimen for conditions like multiple myeloma and myelodysplastic syndromes. It is important to follow the prescribed dosage and consult with a medical provider to understand potential side effects and ensure safe and effective use.

descriptor.name: Keytruda 100mg Health and Wellness (brand - Cipla) by Health & Wellness Store
descriptor.short_desc: Generic Name: Pembrolizumab Dosage: Keytruda 100mg injection / Keytruda 200mg Injection Storage: Store in a temperature (2 - 8°C). Do not freeze. Pembrolizumab Injection is a medical treatment used for cancer therapy. An immunotherapy drug that enhances the body\'s immune system to combat cancer cells. This injection is prescribed by healthcare providers, typically for various advanced cancers, including melanoma, lung cancer, and others. Administered through intravenous infusion, pembrolizumab is a crucial component of modern cancer treatment strategies. It is essential for patients to work closely with their healthcare team to understand the treatment regimen and potential side effects.

descriptor.name: Opdyta 100mg Health and Wellness (brand - Cipla) by Health & Wellness Store
descriptor.short_desc: Generic Name: Nivolumab Dosage: Opdyta 40mg Injection / Opdyta 100mg Injection Storage: Store in a temperature (2 - 8°C). Do not freeze. Nivolumab is a groundbreaking immunotherapy medication used in cancer treatment. It is an immune checkpoint inhibitor that helps the body\'s immune system recognize and attack cancer cells. Nivolumab is prescribed by healthcare professionals for various advanced cancers, including melanoma, lung cancer, and renal cell carcinoma. It is typically administered through intravenous infusion. As a crucial component of modern cancer therapy, Nivolumab offers hope to patients, but its use and potential side effects should be thoroughly discussed with a medical provider.

descriptor.name: Zyceva 150mg Health and Wellness (brand - Cipla) by Health & Wellness Store
descriptor.short_desc: Generic Name: Erlotinib Dosage: Zyceva 100mg Tablet  / Zyceva 150mg Tablet Erlotinib Tablet is a targeted therapy medication used in the treatment of certain types of cancer. It belongs to the class of drugs known as tyrosine kinase inhibitors, and it specifically targets epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR) mutations that can drive cancer growth. Erlotinib is commonly prescribed by healthcare professionals for conditions such as non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) and pancreatic cancer. Patients should consult with their healthcare provider to understand the appropriate usage and potential side effects of Erlotinib

descriptor.name: Nitib 140mg Health and Wellness (brand - Cipla) by Health & Wellness Store
descriptor.short_desc: Generic Name: Ibrutinib Dosage: Ibrutinib 140mg Tablet Ibrutinib is a medication used in the treatment of certain types of blood cancers, most notably chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL), mantle cell lymphoma (MCL), and Waldenström macroglobulinemia.. It belongs to a class of drugs known as Bruton\'s tyrosine kinase (BTK) inhibitors. Ibrutinib works by blocking the action of BTK, a protein that plays a crucial role in the growth and survival of cancerous B cells. This targeted therapy helps slow the progression of these cancers by interrupting the signaling pathways that promote the proliferation of malignant cells.

descriptor.name: Palbace 125mg Health and Wellness (brand - Cipla) by Health & Wellness Store
descriptor.short_desc: Generic Name: Palbociclib Dosage: Palbociclib 75mg Tablet / Palbociclib 100mg Tablet / Palbociclib 125mg Tablet Palbociclib is a targeted cancer medication primarily used in the treatment of certain types of advanced breast cancer. It falls under the category of cyclin-dependent kinase (CDK) inhibitors. This medication specifically inhibits CDK 4 and 6, which are proteins involved in regulating the cell cycle and promoting the growth of cancer cells. By blocking the action of CDK 4 and 6, Palbociclib helps to slow down the progression of breast cancer, particularly in cases where the cancer is hormone receptor-positive and HER2-negative. Palbociclib has proven to be a valuable addition to the treatment options available for advanced breast cancer, offering improved outcomes and extending the time before the disease progresses.

descriptor.name: Jakavi 5mg Health and Wellness (brand - Cipla) by Health & Wellness Store
descriptor.short_desc: Generic Name: Ruxolitinib Dosage: Jakavi 5mg Tablet / Jakavi 10mg Tablet / Jakavi 15mg Tablet / Jakavi 20mg Tablet Ruxolitinib is a medication used for the treatment of certain bone marrow disorders and a specific type of blood cancer called myelofibrosis. It is classified as a Janus kinase (JAK) inhibitor, which works by targeting and inhibiting specific enzymes involved in the regulation of blood cell production. Ruxolitinib can help reduce symptoms associated with myelofibrosis, such as enlarged spleen, anemia, and fatigue. This drug represents a valuable therapeutic option for patients with myelofibrosis, improving their quality of life and potentially slowing down the progression of the disease.
descriptor.long_desc: Generic Name: Ruxolitinib Dosage: Jakavi 5mg Tablet / Jakavi 10mg Tablet / Jakavi 15mg Tablet / Jakavi 20mg Tablet Ruxolitinib is a medication used for the treatment of certain bone marrow disorders and a specific type of blood cancer called myelofibrosis. It is classified as a Janus kinase (JAK) inhibitor, which works by targeting and inhibiting specific enzymes involved in the regulation of blood cell production. descriptor.name: Eleftha 440mg Health and Wellness (brand - Cipla) by Health & Wellness Store
descriptor.short_desc: Generic Name: Trastuzumab Dosage: Eleftha 175mg Injection, Eleftha 375mg Injection, Eleftha 440mg Injection Storage: Store in a temperature (2 - 8°C). Do not freeze. Trastuzumab is primarily used in the treatment of breast cancer that overexpresses the HER2 protein. It is also used for the treatment of metastatic stomach (gastric) cancer. Trastuzumab works by targeting and inhibiting the HER2 receptor, which is overexpressed in certain types of cancer cells. By blocking this receptor, it helps to slow down or stop the growth of cancer cells. Often used in combination with chemotherapy or other targeted therapies to enhance its effectiveness in cancer treatment. Trastuzumab represents a significant advancement in cancer treatment, specifically for HER2-positive cancers, offering targeted therapy with reduced impact on healthy cells compared to traditional chemotherapy.
descriptor.long_desc: Generic Name: Trastuzumab Dosage: Eleftha 175mg Injection, Eleftha 375mg Injection, Eleftha 440mg Injection Storage: Store in a temperature (2 - 8°C). Do not freeze. descriptor.short_desc: Generic Name: Abemaciclib Dosage: Ramiven 50mg Tablet , Ramiven 100mg Tablet , Ramiven 150mg Tablet , Ramiven 200mg Tablet Abemaciclib belongs to therapeutic class of Cyclin-dependent kinase (CDK) inhibitor. Its Approved for the treatment of advanced or metastatic breast cancer. Ramiven Tablets Inhibits CDK4 and CDK6, preventing cell cycle progression and inhibiting cancer cell growth. Abemaciclib has shown significant efficacy in clinical trials, leading to improved progression-free survival in patients with advanced or metastatic breast cancer.

descriptor.name: Mitomycin 10mg Health and Wellness (brand - Cipla) by Health & Wellness Store
descriptor.short_desc: Generic Name: Mitomycin Dosage: Mitomycin 10mg Injection It is an antibiotic belongs to the group know as Antineoplastic which is used in the treatment of various types of cancer, including stomach, pancreatic, lung, and bladder cancers. It Alters DNA structure, preventing cell division and inhibiting the growth of cancer cells. Patients with impaired kidney function should be closely monitored. It may increase the risk of bleeding and infection, so caution is needed in patients with a history of these conditions. Mitomycin has demonstrated efficacy in shrinking tumors and slowing the progression of certain cancers, especially when used in combination with other anticancer drugs.

descriptor.short_desc: Generic Name: Osimertinib Dosage: Tagrisso 40mg Tablet , Tagrisso 80mg Tablet Osimertinib belongs to therapeutic class Tyrosine kinase inhibitor. Medication for lung cancer treatment. Tagrisso is primarily used for the treatment of non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) that has specific mutations known as EGFR T790M. Helps inhibit cancer cell growth by blocking abnormal EGFR signalling.

descriptor.short_desc: Generic Name: Pazopanib Dosage: Votrient 200mg Tablet , Votrient 400mg Tablet , Votrient 800mg Tablet Votrient is prescribed to treat advanced renal cell carcinoma (kidney cancer) and advanced soft tissue sarcoma. Votrient is a tyrosine kinase inhibitor that interferes with the growth of cancer cells. Votrient works by inhibiting the growth of new blood vessels, thereby slowing down the progression of cancer.
